title: Magnitogorsk
summary: Magnitogorsk (Russian: Магнитого́рск, IPA: [məɡnʲɪtɐˈɡorsk], lit. '[city] of the magnetic mountain') is an industrial city in Chelyabinsk Oblast, Russia,  located on the eastern  side of the extreme southern extent of the Ural Mountains by the Ural River. Its population is 407,775 (2010 Census).[1]
